bio:
Hello! My name is Dylan, and I'm the ECSA President for the 2014/2015 academic year.
I'm entering my fifth year of undergrad studying Computing Science, and have been living in ECV for the past two years. Some random things I enjoy include dodgeball, ping pong, badminton, Super Smash Bros, Guitar Hero, piano, and spicy food. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions about anything!
